name: Paper craft
title: Origami crane
description: Create an elegant origami crane with just a single sheet of paper. This classic paper folding technique is perfect for beginners and experienced crafters alike.

name: Origami
title: Christmas gift with tree decorations
description: Craft a festive Christmas gift adorned with charming tree decorations made from origami. Perfect for adding a personalized touch to your holiday presents.

name: Papercutting
title: Crafting Christmas gift with scissors
description: Use the art of papercutting to create a unique Christmas gift. Craft intricate designs with scissors and paper for a memorable present.

name: Quilling
title: Paper quilling artwork
description: Explore the art of quilling to create stunning paper artwork. Roll and shape paper strips to form intricate designs that captivate the eye.

name: Glassblowing
title: Top view of origami craft with paint tubes
description: Admire the beauty of glassblowing as you create unique pieces of art. Use paint tubes to add vibrant colors and textures to your glass creations.

name: Stained glass
title: Paper cutting artwork
description: Discover the beauty of stained glass as you craft intricate designs with paper cutting techniques. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any space.
